frameDefinitions: An Artifact is deliberately made or modified by an intelligent entity to be put to a certain kind of Use.
This frame describes the Impression which a Figure, which can be a person, an organization, or an object, leaves with an Audience.
A Whole, an entity with a substructure, is assessed for whether or not it has all the necessary parts that are defined for it or for an entity of its kind.
A Survivor manages to avoid being negatively affected, despite encountering a Dangerous_situation.
A physical object, the Artifact, is produced by a Creator to stimulate the perceptions, emotions, or cognition of an audience.
In this frame, there is a Part of a Whole in which the Part is defined with respect to the canonical or inherent orientation of the Whole.
frameExamples: There are reports that Kim Il Sung asked China to share its nuclear weapons <t>technology</t>.
He had an extremely fragile self - <t><fex name='Impression'>image</fex></t>
What happens after the PPB investigation is <t>complete</t>?
Wilderness Survival: Could You <t>Survive</t> the Wild?
Sir Denis Mahon is the owner of the most important private collection of Italian Baroque <t><fex name='Artifact'>paintings</fex></t>.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>. This can refer to physical artifacts, like a mug or computer monitor, or a digital artifact, such as a website or document.
The entity (a person, organization, product, or event) for which the <fen>Audience</fen> has an <fen>Impression</fen>.
A person or group of people who have an <fen>Impression</fen> of a <fen>Figure</fen>.
A generalized conception of a <fen>Figure</fen> presented to or shared by an <fen>Audience</fen>.
The entity that is being assessed for having all its necessary parts or not.
The interval of time when the completeness of the entity is assessed.
The <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen> is one in which people are likely or expected to be negatively affected.
The time at which the surviving takes place.
The location where the <fen>Survivor</fen> (primarily) lives during the <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
This role identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Artifact</fen> is presently located.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Our list of participants</fex> is still incomplete.
My journey to the dark side is <fex>now</fex> complete.
<fex>Last year</fex>, Florida residents survived the devastating triple punch of Hurricanes Frances, Ivan and Jeanne,
The first of the two <fex>drawings</fex> by Parmigianino recently acquired for the National Gallery is a study for the Madonna dal collo lungo.
The top <fex>shelf</fex> of the bookcase was lying on the floor.
The show takes place in the West wing <fex>of the White House</fex>.
